data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Review status tracking (pending, approved, rejected, escalated)". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.

data.instruction: Simulate this persona scenario and validate outcome deterministically: "First-time setup flow completion time". Capture traces and snapshots so coverage can be audited later.
data.expectedResult: Scenario behavior is either confirmed as supported or produces a clear, actionable failure report.
